actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude each year $10,000 of pensions and annuities from the gross income of individuals who have attained age 65.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals who have attained age 65 a $10,000 exclusion from gross income of income received from any pension or annuity for which no income tax deduction was allowable for employee contributions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude each year $10,000 of pensions and annuities from the gross income of individuals who have attained age 65.
